data.message: I'm looking for training/documentation/pricing for Facebook Advertising.  Where do I find?

replies.message: Thank you for your interest in advertising on Facebook, Robert. To get started, please visit: http://bit.ly/2bxdvX7. For more information and best practices, take a look at our Facebook for Business resource: http://bit.ly/2buRYJW and Help Center: http://bit.ly/2buT4Wm. We also offer Blueprint, which provides training on everything from campaign optimization to effective ad measurement solutions: http://bit.ly/2bxeDdb. -Brad
